name: Graphiti Knowledge Graph (Unified)
description: Unified temporal knowledge graph with pattern+LLM contradiction detection, goal tracking, temporal queries, and configurable capture filters
author: Blitz + Dexter (collaboration)

autoCaptureFilter.description: Filter for auto-capture: 'all' captures both user and assistant, 'user_only' prevents feedback loops

autoRecall.description: Automatically inject relevant facts into context

captureThreshold.description: Minimum confidence to capture an episode (0-1)

recallTopK.description: Maximum facts to inject into context

recencyBoostDays.description: Days threshold for recency boost marker

llmModel.description: LLM model for classification and fallback contradiction detection

useLlmContradictionFallback.description: Use LLM as fallback when pattern-based contradiction detection finds nothing
